answers.answer: Definitely, go to another hospital. I am first time mom. I am 21 weeks pregnant. I don't  know so much but I would recommend you to go another hospital immediately.
Thanks cause I'm 36 weeks as of today and the other doctors wanted me to stay because of my history but she was being a complete *******

question: I'm 3cm dilated and 50% effaced and the hospital released me because the doctor didn't want to keep me but I'm high risk diabetes high blood pressure and have a history of preterm labor and delivery an the contractions were 3-6 minutes apart while being in the hospital she didn't check me again before she released me should I go to a different hospital
title: 3 cm dilated
